channel.title: incremental learning on Jonathan`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in incremental learning on Jonathan`s Blog

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- ReID] Augmented Geometric Distillation for Data-Free Incre. ReID (CVPR 2022)
item.description: Augmented Geometric Distillation for Data-Free Incremental Person ReID (CVPR 2022) 开源代码传送门 概述 本文关注 Incremental ReID (IL-ReID) 任务，提出了一种增广的几何蒸馏架构 (Augmented Geometric Distillation framework, AGD)，其包含增广蒸馏 (AD) 和几何蒸馏 (GD)。

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 增量学习] Striking a Balance between Stability-Plasticity for CIL (ICCV 2021)
item.description: Striking a Balance between Stability and Plasticity for Class-Incremental Learning (ICCV 2021) 概述 类增量学习任务 (Class-Incremental Learning, CIL)。 适应新类要求模型具有可塑性 (plasticity)，而不忘记学到的旧类别要求稳定性 (
